meanings.definition: A person who explores the ocean depths.
meanings.sent1: The oceanauts dove deep to study sea creatures.
meanings.sent2: The oceanauts discovered a new species of fish.
meanings.sent3: The oceanauts found a funny-looking octopus during their expedition.
meanings.sent4: The oceanauts are like modern-day underwater adventurers.
meanings.sent5: The oceanauts' mission is to unravel the mysteries of the deep sea.

meanings.definition: The crew of a submarine or underwater vessel.
meanings.sent1: The oceanauts navigated the submarine through the coral reef.
meanings.sent2: The oceanauts maintained the equipment on board the vessel.
meanings.sent3: The oceanauts had a friendly competition on who could spot the most fish.
meanings.sent4: The oceanauts are the unsung heroes of the undersea world.
meanings.sent5: The oceanauts' teamwork ensured the success of their underwater mission.
